EmailTemplate.name: 18-Bus @ Cloud Spd-Peering Engineering-Email-EmailSeriesPeerng-T003Q5.Email 5.3
EmailTemplate.subject: Find out more about Nokia express peering
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Hello {{lead.First Name}}, If you read our app note, you’ll know it outlines Nokia express peering and its support for egress and ingress peering engineering, application latency engineering, as well as DDoS protection. If you’re interested in learning more about our solution, take a look at the Nokia express peering solution page <[[http://pf.content.nokia.com/webscale-peering-hub/automated-peering-engineering?lb_email=%7b%7blead.email%20address%7d%7d&did=d000000001k3&utm_campaign=peering_engineering&utm_source=email-list-marketo-webscale&utm_medium=email&utm_content=express-peering-app-note&utm_term=peering-personal-follow-up]]>, or request a call so we can have an expert follow up with you. Sincerely, Jeff Sugimoto Global Technical Sales Leader, Nokia Enterprise © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[https://{{my.emailContactUs}}]]> | Privacy <[[https://{{my.emailPrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[https://{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]>
<[[https://{{my.SocialURL-Linkedin}}]]>

<[[https://{{my.SocialURL-Blog}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
